reviewText: I was interested in this actor and didn't know much about him.  These three films really showcase his talent.  An interesting fellow and no doubt one we will see more of.

Javier Bardem Double Feature (no country for old men/Biutiful)
Very well done. Javier Bardem is excellent in both features.
JB
I don't know what he was thinking in the other 2 movies, No Country for Old Men was really good while the other 2 REALLY SUCKED!
Oh yes we loved the movies, arrived on the date we were told.

Biutiful is slow and captioned only (no English spoken) would have never purchased a foreign caption only movie; Mondays in Sun refused to play on any of our players or computer; No Country is a great film but already owned so did not try to play. This is not a reflection of Bardem movies but how  we feel ripped off that 2 are worthless. Misrepresented as not in English, such poor quality (China product??) as useless. Will not trust Amazon for movies again, not represented truthfully. Should have been given choice of watching foreign language movie, the defective movie totally inexcusable.

No Country for Old Men - Excellent.
Biutiful - blah.
On time. In good condition.

This is a very good set of films. Javier Bardem is an excellent actor, very intense. He was superb in No Country for Old Men. He exemplified the theme which was that it appears to old men that the world is so bad they do not belong in it any more. Bardem was so brutal in the film and so neurotic that one would not want to be anywhere near the person he portrayed.
Love  Javier Bardem the actor so any movie he is in suits me just fine  Three great movies  to watch anytime..
No Country for Old Men is an extraordinary movie.  Bardem's character appears  to be meant for him to play.
Came in great condition and quickly. The perfect present for a Javier Bardem fan! The movies are all excellent as well.
